nodes.text: Tulon Voidgazer was a female human genius who was engineered and trained by Doctor Cylo to replace the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Vader as Darth Sidious' enforcer.

Voidgazer was a scientist working on high-level R&D work projects. She also had many close friends that were specialists. After many of her friends were killed aboard the Death Star, she demonstrated her abilities against Sith Lord Darth Vader before Emperor Palpatine on Dr. Cylo's research base. She later fought alongside Vader and Cylo's other creations in the War on Shu-Torun.
Using distributed intelligence in a series of droids connected to her enhanced cerebellum; she could control those droids with her mind.
